message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a very competitive price for the value you'll receive.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $10,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800?
